title: Fabric Alliance Certification Schema
description: Defines the required structure for a certified agent record in the Fabric Alliance registry.

agentName.description: Human-readable name of the agent being certified.

agentId.description: Unique identifier for the agent. Must match on-chain Fabric runtime ID.

certificationLevel.description: Certification level assigned by the DAO.

daoProposalRef.description: Reference to the DAO proposal that approved this certification (e.g., DAO-PROP-001).

certifiedDate.description: Date when the certification was approved.

certifiedBy.description: Entity or DAO multisig that issued this certification.

nftTokenId.description: Token ID of the Certification NFT minted for this agent.

nftContractAddress.description: Smart contract address of the Certification NFT.
